meanings.sent1: She kept misestimating the time it would take to finish her homework.
meanings.sent2: He realized he was misestimating the distance to the park.
meanings.sent3: The magician's misestimating of the audience's reactions led to a hilarious performance.
meanings.sent4: The detective was misestimating the suspect's intentions, leading to a wrong conclusion.
meanings.sent5: Misestimating the weight of the package, she almost dropped it.

meanings.definition: To make an incorrect judgment or calculation about (something).
meanings.sent1: They were misestimating the cost of the repairs for their car.
meanings.sent2: The weather forecasters were misestimating the severity of the storm.
meanings.sent3: Misestimating the size of the cake, she ended up with too many leftovers.
meanings.sent4: The coach was misestimating the opponent's strategy, putting the team at a disadvantage.
meanings.sent5: Misestimating the depth of the water, he jumped in and hit the bottom.
